issue.message: When using `setHasFixedSize() in an `RecyclerView`, `wrap_content` cannot be used as \ a value for `size` in the scrolling direction.
issue.summary: When using `setHasFixedSize() in an `RecyclerView`, `wrap_content` cannot be used as \ a value for `size` in the scrolling direction.
issue.explanation: When a RecyclerView uses `setHasFixedSize(...)` you cannot use `wrap_content` for size in the scrolling direction.
